remarks: Derive the coefficient function for the product of two polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.)
statement:
plyaddlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plyaddlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
plyaddlem.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
plyaddlem.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
plyaddlem.a $e |- ( ph -> A : NN0 --> CC ) $.
plyaddlem.b $e |- ( ph -> B : NN0 --> CC ) $.
plyaddlem.a2 $e |- ( ph -> ( A " ( ZZ>= ` ( M + 1 ) ) ) = { 0 } ) $.
plyaddlem.b2 $e |- ( ph -> ( B " ( ZZ>= ` ( N + 1 ) ) ) = { 0 } ) $.
plyaddlem.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... M ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
plyaddlem.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( B ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
plymullem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF x. G ) = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ n e. ( 0 ... ( M + N ) ) ( sum_ k e. ( 0 ... n ) ( ( A ` k ) x. ( B ` ( n - k ) ) ) x. ( z ^ n ) ) ) ) $.
$d A n $.
$d B k n $.
$d M k n $.
$d N k n $.
$d k n ph z $.
